name: Feasibility Details
query:
SELECT
    f.name AS "Feasibility ID:Link/Feasibility:150",
    f.customer_type AS "Customer Type:Data:150",
    f.feaseibility_from AS "Feasibility From:Data:150",
    f.customer AS "Customer:Link/Customer:180",
    f.site_name AS "Site Name:Data:200",
    f.customer_request AS "Customer Request:Text:200",
    f.sales_person AS "Sales Person:Link/Sales Person:150",
    f.order_type AS "Order Type:Data:120",
    f.circuit_id AS "Circuit ID:Data:150",
    f.exiting_circuit_id AS "Existing Circuit ID:Data:150",
    f.feasibility_status AS "Feasibility Status:Data:150",
    f.reason_for_high_commercials AS "Reason For High Commercials:Text:200",
    f.reason_for_not_feasible AS "Reason For Not Feasible:Text:200",
    f.site_type AS "Site Type:Data:150",
    f.site_id__legal_code AS "Site Legal Code:Data:150",
    f.territory AS "Territory:Link/Territory:150",
    f.solution_name AS "Solution Name:Data:200",
    f.primary_data_plan_name AS "Primary Data Plan:Data:200",
    f.secondary_data_plan_name AS "Secondary Data Plan:Data:200",
    f.static_ip AS "Static IP:Data:100",
    f.config_type AS "Config Type:Data:150",
    f.no_of_static_ip_required AS "Nos of Static IP Required:Int:120",
    f.managed_services AS "Managed Services:Data:150",
    u.full_name AS "Created By:Data:180"
FROM
    `tabFeasibility` f
LEFT JOIN
    `tabUser` u ON u.name = f.owner
WHERE
    f.docstatus < 2
ORDER BY
    f.creation DESC
LIMIT 18446744073709551615;
